code: import React,{useState}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import AiReportCard from'../components/AiReportCard';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminAIDashboard=()=>{const[report,setReport]=useState(null);const[metrics,setMetrics]=useState(null);const generate=async function(){let period=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'30d';try{const res=await api.getAIReport({period});setReport({report_text:res.report_text});setMetrics(res.metrics);}catch(e){console.error(e);setReport(null);setMetrics(null);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl text-white font-bold mb-4",children:"AI Reports"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>generate('7d'),className:"px-3 py-1 bg-gray-700 rounded",children:"7 days"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>generate('30d'),className:"px-3 py-1 bg-gray-700 rounded",children:"30 days"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AiReportCard,{report:report,onExpand:()=>{}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white/5 rounded p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-white font-semibold",children:"Metrics"}),metrics?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-gray-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Total interactions: ",metrics.total_interactions]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Phishing clicks: ",metrics.phishing_clicks]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Avg quiz score: ",metrics.avg_quiz_score]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-400",children:"No metrics"})]})]})]});};export default AdminAIDashboard;
